abstract: Presidential historian's assistant Jason Savedoff pleads guilty to conspiring to steal documents from the Maryland Historical Society archives; Savedoff and the historian Barry Landau were charged with stealing documents which included papers signed by President Lincoln.
snippet: A presidential historian’s assistant, Jason Savedoff, has pleaded guilty to conspiring to steal documents from archives, including papers signed by President Lincoln.
lead_paragraph: A presidential historian’s assistant, Jason Savedoff, has pleaded guilty to conspiring to steal documents from archives, including papers signed by President Lincoln.

headline.main: Maryland: Guilty Plea in Thefts at Archives
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Guilty Plea in Thefts at Archives
headline.seo: Jason Savedoff Pleads Guilty in Thefts at Archives
